function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Linear increase in infection risk with exposure time","Impact":"Higher infection probability over longer exposure periods","Mitigation":"Implement strict ventilation systems and enforce social distancing measures","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air purifiers, CO2 monitoring, occupancy sensors","People":"Passengers and occupants of built environments","Owner":"Building owners, transportation authorities, government health agencies"},{"Description":"High infection probability in high-density occupancy areas","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission in crowded spaces","Mitigation":"Reducing occupancy density by 50%, implementing strict ventilation, and enforcing social distancing measures","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, ventilation systems, air purifiers, CO2 monitoring","People":"Passengers, commuters, and occupants of high-density areas","Owner":"Building owners, transportation authorities, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Variation in infection probability with occupancy ratio and exposure time","Impact":"Risk of transmission influenced by occupancy ratio and exposure time","Mitigation":"Reduce occupancy density by 50%, improve ventilation, and enforce social distancing measures","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, ventilation systems, air purifiers, CO2 monitoring","People":"Occupants and commuters in various built environments","Owner":"Building owners, transportation authorities, government health agencies"}]}
